Name: On Space
About the game: Welcome to space. You are a pilot of a spaceship and your task is to destroy enemy spaceships and survive. Move to the sides to avoid shells flying at you, shoot at enemy ships and fly as far as possible.Use your keyboard and mouse to control steering and shooting. Happy hunting, captain.
